>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">(Neuhausen-Stuttgart American Institute of Musicology, Hänssler-Verlag)</div>
  <div class="csl-entry">(American Institute of Musicology, Hänssler-Verlag)</div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" version="1.0" demote-non-dropping-particle="sort-only" page-range-format="minimal">
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
      <choose>
        <if type="article-journal">
          <choose>
            <if variable="volume">
              <text macro="issued" prefix=" (" suffix=")"/>
            </if>
            <else>
              <text macro="issued" prefix=", "/>
            </else>
          </choose>
        </if>
        <else-if variable="publisher-place publisher" match="any">
          <group prefix="(" suffix=")" delimiter=", ">
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <choose>
                <if variable="title" match="none"/>
                <else-if type="thesis speech" match="any">
                  <text variable="genre" prefix="unpublished "/>
                </else-if>
              </choose>
              <text variable="event"/>
            </group>
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <text variable="publisher-place"/>
              <text variable="publisher"/>
            </group>
          </group>
        </else-if>
        <else>
          <text variable="issued" prefix=", "/>
        </else>
      </choose>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<
